    RentScooterService.payFeeAndReturnScooter(User user)
    represents properly terminate the renting, execute the following actions: (1) calculate the fee with no coupon (2) archived the rent history (3) decouple the scooter from the user
    double
    RentScooterService.payFeeAndReturnScooter(User user, Coupon coupon)
    represents properly terminate the renting, execute the following actions: (1) calculate the fee with coupon checking (2) archived the rent history (3) decouple the scooter from the user
    boolean
    RentScooterService.rentScooter(User user, Scooter scooter)
    start renting the scooter, will trigger following actions: (1) store Scooter inside User to represent the action of renting a scooter, (2) update user's position to scooter's position (3) Switch scooter's status to occupied (4) new a RentHistory to user
    boolean
    RentScooterService.rideScooter(User user)
    start riding scooter, the position will be updated and recorded to the rentHistory
    ArrayList<ChargingStation>
